page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: All houses at Sea Road, Carlyon Bay, are detatched and have 2 or 3 storeys. Detatched houses are not joined to any other house. They are made of blocks. They are very expensive. The road they face onto is private. A typical house in Sea Road has several large windows, and a large front door. They have chimneys and they owners may use open fires. There's also an extension on the front. These houses are mostly owned by people who are fairly well off. The house owners welcome tourists and there are many sights for accomodation. There are many hotels. Nearby are some detatched and semi-detatched houses, offering a place for people who cannot afford to buy their own home, such as old people, family or young people.
